about_the_game:
"I'm a man with amnesia. However, I see in my dreams a paradise filled with carnal pleasures, pornography, and explicit sex.
I need to find this place to recover my lost memory."
- Excerpt from Lenny's diary -

A man needs to follow a trail in the desert that will lead him to the mythical and erotic Garden of Earthly Delights. He has lost his memory and the only reference to his past is in the mysterious stones he was carrying. He was found by Melody on the banks of a river completely naked, carrying only a bag of said stones. What is this legendary paradise that the stones reveal? What is his relationship with this paradise of carnal pleasures, watered with the most libidinous explicit sex?






This is the story of Lenny "Nobody", a man in search of answers about his past. He was found with no memory by a young recluse named Melody in the swamps. Lenny was naked and carrying a bag of runestones and valuable diamonds, which are the only clues he has to discover more about himself.
After extensive research, he finally finds the answer in the Atacama Desert. The place hides a passage that leads to a world full of carnal pleasures, known as "The Secret Garden of All Delights". It is a true erotic paradise, full of nudity, pleasure, and explicit sex without shame.
He discovers traces of a pagan temple within the desert, containing huge Germanic runes scattered among the stones and a cave mouth shaped like a vagina. Upon entering the cave, Lenny catches a glimpse of an incredible mythical world, filled with lots of sex and pornography.
In this world, Lenny envisions hundreds of men and women engaging in explicit sexual acts in the middle of an enormous bucolic garden, an explosion of carnal and humid pleasures, a true paradise of the flesh.







This is a traditional visual novel with choice options buttons and mouse-click navigation.
Click on the text or in the "colored leaf" to advance. The game has a menu located at the top left. When clicking on the orange icon with four black stripes, a submenu will appear with options to control sound, go back to the beginning, and save the dialogs.
On the game's home screen (Main Menu), you should go to the PLAY menu. Three language options will appear. Each of them is represented by one of the characters.
Just click on the character corresponding to the language of your choice to start the game. English, Spanish, Portuguese.
IMPORTANT!

This game is AVAILABLE in ENGLISH, PORTUGUESE, AND SPANISH.
Only the MAIN MENU BUTTONS (In English) is not available for other languages.

Game Time:
Approximately 3 hours and 10 minutes if you read approximately 200 words per minute.
Of course, the player can stay longer per scene to enjoy the animations and screens.
On average each sequence is 5 to 8 minutes long. There are 982 screens and 260 animations
1246 SCENES spread over 16 chapters. If the player stays 12 seconds per SCENE the game will extend for 4 hours.

content_descriptors.notes:
This visual novel contains explicit sex scenes. Characters are naked for most of the game. There are masturbation scenes, explicit sex images, and animations. The entire story of this game uses sexual terms and expressions.
ALL characters are over 21 years old.

name: Garden of Earthly Delights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8.1/7
  • Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family (HD 4000)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8.1/7 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-2400 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: I'm a man with amnesia. However, I see in my dreams a paradise filled with carnal pleasures, pornography, and explicit sex. I need to find this place to recover my lost memory. Melody found me unconscious and naked. She saved my life and I love her. However, I must face my destiny!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
